verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's main talking point about a [ARGM-TMP: recently] [V: released] [ARG1: report] about the FBI 's handling of the Hillary Clinton email investigation is that it " exonerates " him in the Russia investigation . Department of Justice officials disagree .
